attribute.value: select zh.jxdxdh,zh.zhdh,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.khh,coalesce(js.tzlj,0) tzlj from JXDX_JSZH_$nf$ zh left join SGDR_JSZH_TZJS js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh and ($tzrq$-1) between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where zh.zhdh='$zhdh$'

select zh.jxdxdh,zh.zhdh,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.khh,coalesce(js.tzlj,0) tzlj from JXDX_JSZH_$nf$ zh left join SGDR_JSZH_TZJS js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh and ($tzrq$-1) between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where zh.zhdh='$zhdh$'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select coalesce(js.qsrq, zh.tjrq) tjrq, zh.zhdh, zh.zhhm, zh.khh, zh.zhjs, zh.sdye, coalesce(js.tzlj, 0) tzlj, coalesce(js.tzjs, 0) tzjs, js.tzyy, coalesce(zh.jxdxdh, 0) jxdxdh, coalesce(js.qsrq, 0) qsrq , coalesce(js.jsrq, 29991231) jsrq from jxdx_jszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ zh left join sgdr_jszh_tzjs js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where 1=1 and zh.tjrq=$tjrq_yyyy$0101 and zh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and zh.zhdh like '%$zhdh$%' and exists( select 1 from xtb_xtcs where lower(csmc)='sys_date' and 'all'='$zt$' ) union all select coalesce(js.qsrq, zh.tjrq) tjrq, zh.zhdh, zh.zhhm, zh.khh, zh.zhjs, zh.sdye, js.tzlj, js.tzjs, js.tzyy, coalesce(zh.jxdxdh, 0) jxdxdh, coalesce(js.qsrq, 0) qsrq , coalesce(js.jsrq, 29991231) jsrq from jxdx_jszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ zh inner join sgdr_jszh_tzjs js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh where 1=1 and zh.tjrq=$tjrq_yyyy$0101 and zh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and zh.zhdh like '%$zhdh$%' and $tjrq$ between js.qsrq and js.jsrq and exists( select 1 from xtb_xtcs where lower(csmc)='sys_date' and 'js'='$zt$' )

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select coalesce(js.qsrq, zh.tjrq) tjrq, zh.zhdh, zh.zhhm, zh.khh, zh.zhjs, zh.sdye, coalesce(js.tzlj, 0) tzlj, coalesce(js.tzjs, 0) tzjs, js.tzyy, coalesce(zh.jxdxdh, 0) jxdxdh, coalesce(js.qsrq, 0) qsrq , coalesce(js.jsrq, 29991231) jsrq from jxdx_jszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ zh left join sgdr_jszh_tzjs js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where 1=1 and zh.tjrq=$tjrq_yyyy$0101 and zh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and zh.zhdh like '%$zhdh$%' and exists( select 1 from xtb_xtcs where lower(csmc)='sys_date' and 'all'='$zt$' ) union all select coalesce(js.qsrq, zh.tjrq) tjrq, zh.zhdh, zh.zhhm, zh.khh, zh.zhjs, zh.sdye, js.tzlj, js.tzjs, js.tzyy, coalesce(zh.jxdxdh, 0) jxdxdh, coalesce(js.qsrq, 0) qsrq , coalesce(js.jsrq, 29991231) jsrq from jxdx_jszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ zh inner join sgdr_jszh_tzjs js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh where 1=1 and zh.tjrq=$tjrq_yyyy$0101 and zh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and zh.zhdh like '%$zhdh$%' and $tjrq$ between js.qsrq and js.jsrq and exists( select 1 from xtb_xtcs where lower(csmc)='sys_date' and 'js'='$zt$' ) ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select TZLJ, ZHHM, TZYY, KHH, TZJS, ZZH, QSRQ, JXDXDH, ZHDH, JSRQ from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS where 1= 1 and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select TZLJ, ZHHM, TZYY, KHH, TZJS, ZZH, QSRQ, JXDXDH, ZHDH, JSRQ from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS where 1= 1 and QSRQ = $tzrq$ and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_JSZH_TZJS( TZLJ, JXDXDH, KHH, ZHHM, ZZH, TZJS, TZYY, JSRQ, ZHDH, QSRQ ) values ( $tzlj$,$jxdxdh$,'$khh$','$zhhm$','$zzh$',$tzjs$,'$tzyy$',$jsrq$,'$zhdh$',$tzrq$)
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_JSZH_TZJS set TZJS = $tzjs$,TZYY = '$tzyy$' where 1=1 and QSRQ = $tzrq$ and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS where 1=1 and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS where qsrq >=$tzrq$ and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_JSZH_TZJS set jsrq=$qdate$ where $tzrq$ between qsrq and jsrq and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS where 1=1 and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select TZLJ, ZHHM, TZYY, KHH, TZJS, ZZH, QSRQ, JXDXDH, ZHDH, JSRQ from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS where 1=1 and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$ and $tzrq$ > $maxqsrq$
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_JSZH_TZJS set jsrq =29991231 where 1=1 and JXDXDH = $jxdxdh$ and jsrq =$lastjsrq$

update SGDR_JSZH_TZJS set tzlj=tzjs+coalesce(( select tzlj tzjs from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS js inner join csb_sjw sjw on 1=1 and sjw.tjrq=$tzrq$ and sjw.sr between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where zhdh='$zhdh$' ),0) where qsrq=$tzrq$

update SGDR_JSZH_TZJS set tzlj=tzjs+coalesce(( select tzlj tzjs from SGDR_JSZH_TZJS js inner join csb_sjw sjw on 1=1 and sjw.tjrq=$tzrq$ and sjw.sr between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where zhdh='$zhdh$' ),0) where qsrq=$tzrq$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select zh.jxdxdh,zh.zhdh,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.khh,coalesce(js.tzlj,0) tzlj from JXDX_JSZH_$nf$ zh left join SGDR_JSZH_TZJS js on zh.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh and ($tzrq$-1) between js.qsrq and js.jsrq where zh.zhdh='$zhdh$'

javascript.query: jQuery(document).ready(function () { var $ = jQuery; $('#zt').append(''); $('#zt').append(''); }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ return true; } function customFastLink($table,row){//this 对象绑定当前行的单元格 if(row['QSRQ']!='0'){ var edit = $('编辑'); var del = $('删除'); this.append(edit);//.append(' ').append(del); this.append(del);//.append(' ').append(del); edit.click(function(){ showUpdateEdtiDialog($table.datagrid("getRows")[$(this).parent().parent().parent().attr("datagrid-row-index")]); }); del.click(function(){ showDeleteDialog($table.datagrid("getRows")[$(this).parent().parent().parent().attr("datagrid-row-index")]); }); return true; }else{ return false; } } function showDeleteDialog(sel){ var jsrq=sel["JSRQ"]+''; if(jsrq.substring(4,8)!='1231') { alert("只能删除结束日期为年末的记录，请重新操作!"); return ; } custom_confirm('你确定要删除所选记录吗？','提示',function(){ var colIds="JXDXDH,QSRQ,TJRQ,ZHDH,ZHHM,KHH,ZHJS,TZLJ,TZJS,TZYY"; var colId=colIds.split(",");//所有的主键名 var params="&"; //URL的参数 for(var i=0;i
javascript.edit: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 $('#zhdh').executeOnEvent('blur', 'zhjstz_getzh', setzh) $('#tzyy').attr("maxlength","50"); $('#tzrq').change(function(){ $('#nf').val($('#tzrq').val().substring(0,4)); }).trigger('change'); }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ $('#jsrq').val(createTimeObj($('#tzrq').val()).nm); if(parseFloat($('#tzlj').val(),10)+parseFloat($('#tzjs').val(),10)<0){ alert('基数调整值不能小于'+$('#tzlj').val()); return false; }else{ $('#tzlj').val(parseFloat($('#tzlj').val(),10)+parseFloat($('#tzjs').val(),10)); } return PAS.di.isDone(); } function setzh(obj){ if(obj.status==0){ if(obj.data.length==0){ $('#zhdh').validationFiled('账号输入错误'); }else{ $('#zhdh').validationPass('zhjstz_getzh'); $('#jxdxdh').val(obj.data[0]['JXDXDH']); $('#zzh').val(obj.data[0]['ZZH']); $('#zhhm').val(obj.data[0]['ZHHM']); $('#khh').val(obj.data[0]['KHH']); $('#tzlj').val(obj.data[0]['TZLJ']); PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); } }else{ $('#zhdh').validationFiled('服务器错误'); } }
